DoctoralCommitteeFormationForm.formPurpose: To propose the members of the Doctoral Committee for a Research Scholar/Assistant at the suggestion of the supervisor.

approvalWorkflow.action: Requests approval for the proposed committee.

DoctoralCommitteeFormationForm.administrativeNote: After signature by the Dean (Academic), the original form is to be kept in the student's personal file, and a photocopy will be sent to the Supervisor and the department.
